abstract: Current TV will provide the pan-Arab news giant with something it has sought for years: a pathway into American living rooms.
snippet: Current TV will provide the pan-Arab news giant with something it has sought for years: a pathway into American living rooms.
lead_paragraph: 9:16 p.m. | Updated Al Jazeera, the pan-Arab news giant, has long tried to convince Americans that it is a legitimate news organization, not a parrot of Middle Eastern propaganda or something more sinister.

headline.main: Al Jazeera Seeks a U.S. Voice Where Gore Failed
headline.print_headline: Al Jazeera Seeks a U.S. Voice Where Gore Failed
